title: Turn off Bluetooth microphone
content:
My bluetooth earbud mic is too soft. I want to take calls with audio outputting into my earbuds, but using the microphone on my phone.

I searched quite a bit and tried a lot.

For example:

Lesser AudioSwitch - "Non-Blueooth microphone will only be used if Bluetooth microphone is unavailable", so I need to find a way to somehow disable the mic in my earbuds if I want to use this option

Earphone mode off - only works for wired earphones

How do I turn of the bluetooth mic (I want the sound still come though bluetooth).

Also another user posted the same question a while back without answer ... (https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/46312326?hl=en)
